mapper.select: SELECT userComSubjectCode ,comSystemNumeral ,comCode,userComSubjectName ,memberEmail ,userComSubjectNumeral FROM cfusercomsubject WHERE userComSubjectCode=#{userComSubjectCode}

SELECT uc.userComSubjectCode ,s.comSystemNumeral ,s.comSystemName ,uc.comCode ,uc.userComSubjectName ,uc.memberEmail ,uc.userComSubjectNumeral FROM cfusercomsubject AS uc INNER JOIN cfcomsystem AS s ON uc.comSystemNumeral = s.comSystemNumeral WHERE uc.comCode = #{comCode};
SELECT comSubjectNumeral ,comSystemNumeral ,comSubjectName FROM cfcomsubject WHERE comSubjectNumeral=#{comSubjectNumeral}
SELECT comSystemNumeral ,comSubjectNumeral ,comSubjectName FROM cfcomsubject WHERE comSubjectName like CONCAT('%',#{comSubjectName},'%') ORDER BY comSubjectNumeral ASC

SELECT csm.comSystemNumeral ,csm.comSystemName ,cst.comSubjectNumeral ,cst.comSubjectName FROM cfcomsubject AS cst INNER JOIN cfcomsystem AS csm ON cst.comSystemNumeral = csm.comSystemNumeral WHERE cst.comSystemNumeral = #{comSystemNumeral} ORDER BY csm.comSystemNumeral ASC

SELECT csm.comSystemNumeral ,csm.comSystemName ,cst.comSubjectNumeral ,cst.comSubjectName FROM cfcomsubject AS cst INNER JOIN cfcomsystem AS csm ON cst.comSystemNumeral = csm.comSystemNumeral ORDER BY csm.comSystemNumeral ASC
SELECT comSystemNumeral ,comSystemName FROM cfcomsystem WHERE comSystemNumeral=#{comSystemNumeral}
